data.name: About
data.value:
MSI Fan Control A fast, lightweight fan control utility for MSI laptops, written in C#. Copyright Â© Sparronator9999, 2023-2024
This program is free software: you can redistribute it and/or modify it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as published by the Free Software Foundation, either version 3 of the License, or (at your option) any later version.
This program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful, but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the GNU General Public License for more details.
You should have received a copy of the GNU General Public License along with this program. If not, visit <https://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-3.0.html> for a copy.

data.name: svcErrorConnect
data.value:
Failed to connect to the MSI Fan Control service. Make sure the service is running, then try again.
Details (provide this when reporting bugs): {0}

data.name: svcErrorCrash
data.value: The MSI Fan Control Service crashed while starting. Check the Event viewer and service log for crash details.

data.name: svcErrorStart
svcInstallFail
data.value: The service failed to install. Try running MSI Fan Control again, and if the service installation fails again, open a bug report with this error.

data.name: svcInstallSuccess
data.value: Service installed successfully! Please run MSI Fan Control again to start using it.

data.name: svcNotFound
data.value:
The MSI Fan Control Service is not installed.
Additionally, the executable for the MSI Fan Control Service was not found in the same folder as this program.
Try re-installing MSI Fan Control to fix this.

data.name: svcNotInstalled
data.value: The MSI Fan Control Service is not installed yet. Would you like to install it now?

data.name: svcNotRunning
data.value: The MSI Fan Control Service is currently not running. Would you like to start it now? (Clicking "No" will quit the program.)

data.name: ttAbout
data.value: Show information about this program, including copyright and licensing information.

data.name: ttApply
data.value: Applies the currently loaded config to the system.

data.name: ttChgLim
data.value: Llimits the charge percentage of the battery in this laptop to the specified percentage. Set to "0" to disable this feature.

data.name: ttECMon
data.value:
When enabled, prints information about the fan speed and RPM, and the temperature of the component being cooled by the fan (CPU, GPU...)
WARNING: This will continually poll your EC while enabled. This may cause lag or other issues on some systems.

data.name: ttFanSel
data.value: The fan to adjust a fan curve for. Depending on your laptop, there may be multiple fans listed here, even if your laptop only has one physical fan installed.

data.name: ttFullBlast
data.value: Sets all fans to full blast while checked.

data.name: ttLoadConf
data.value: Loads an XML config to edit or apply.

data.name: ttNotSupported
data.value: This feature is not supported by your system.

data.name: ttProfSel
data.value: The fan profile to adjust for the current fan.

data.name: ttRevert
data.value: Revert the currently loaded config to when it was first loaded using "Load Config". (NOT WORKING YET)

data.name: ttSaveConf
data.value: Saves the currently loaded config to an XML file.

data.name: ttSelfExplan
data.value: Do you really need a tooltip to know what this does?

data.name: ttSource
data.value: Go to the GitHub page for this project.
